name: OnionBoi (HendersonSoftworks)
description:
Guide OnionBoi through randomly generated dungeons to find the Golden Onion! Watch out for Bubbabrains and hazards along the way!

Design & Development
Thomas Henderson

Cover Art by Dotty Illustrations (@dottyillustrations)

Sound FX created using Chiptone (by SFB Games)

Font by Codeman38 - Press Start Regular
